snippet: San Francisco quarterback Colin Kaepernick on Wednesday received a six-year contract extension that could keep him with the 49ers through the 2020 season.
abstract: San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick receives a six-year contract extension that could keep him with the team through the 2020 NFL season; other pro football news noted.
lead_paragraph: San Francisco quarterback Colin Kaepernick on Wednesday received a six-year contract extension that could keep him with the 49ers through the 2020 season.
